author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom sink sanitary tee tips…I set the tee about 21 inches off the concrete so that after the tile it’ll be at roughly 20 inches. I use Ironclad Cleanfit nitrile gloves to protect my hands from the primer and cement, I like these gloves for tile work as well. About 3 to 4 revolutions of the primer on the pipe/fitting followed by 3 to 4 revolutions of cement make this a solid solvent weld. Many thanks to Ironclad for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Bathroom Sink Sanitary Tee Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
